resources.string: Copy data from your phone -> to another phone
This is a figure based on actual experience based on the Bugman 125, and this information is simply used as a reference. No liability is assumed for this content.

"The oil is changed between 10 and 15 days at 1500km. The price is changed at the cheapest According to the manual, based on Bugman 125 The first 1,000km, then 3,000km After that, it is changed once every 4000km. is listed as "
The oil filter is changed at about 10,000 km when the oil is changed. In the manual, the first 1,000 km and the next 8,000 km are indicated as an exchange cycle.
The brake pads are grinding when you hear a crunching sound from the wheel when the disc wears out the brake pads wear out faster
Tires are unexpectedly thought of lightly, but they are the most important part. Be sure to replace them before the wear line runs out
The belt is changed at about 20,000 km based on the Bugman 125, and each person differs from motorcycle to motorcycle The manual says to change at 12,000 km.
I check the move ball when I change the belt I change it at about 40,000 km If the motorcycle doesn\'t work well I\'d like to check it
Based on Bugman 125, the mission oil is changed at the same time as changing the belt, and it is changed once every 20,000 km.
The air cleaner is not cleaned often It is changed at about 10000 km The manual says to clean it once every 3000 km and change it at 12000 km.

"In the case of a clutch shoe or pulley set, it seems to break down between 40,000 and 70,000. The variation is large and expensive, so it is difficult to grind in advance and it is difficult to change when it breaks. "
Bearings should be checked frequently when changing tires after about 30,000 km or more and bearing rubber should also be changed when changing.
Replace the plug at about 20,000 km and replace it when the motorcycle rattles loses power. The manual says to change it at 8,000 km.

The valve gap adjustment seems to be done once every 30,000 to 50,000 km , the symptom is that when you go and stand the engine shuts off or the engine turns off frequently if the engine shuts off at that number of kilos you need to check it.
Check the drivetrain every time you open it to make sure it doesn\'t stop while going.
The engine rarely breaks but check it from time to time.
"Lamps break more often on rainy days if they burn a lot, so let's stay at home on rainy or snowy days "
Check it often without any other malfunction Let\'s live a long time
Discs should be worn and replaced when they are old. If they are not replaced, the brake pads will wear out quickly and the power will gradually decrease.
